mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectComOvseaDlvCstPlcLangHis Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_SN , LANG_CD , HIST_DT , DLV_MTHD_DSCR , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM COM_OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_LANG_HIS WHERE 1 = 1 AND OVSEA_DLV_CST_PLC_SN = #{ovseaDlvCstPlcSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND LANG_CD = #{langCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HIST_DT = #{histDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
